title: 김동원(화학공학과)
content:
김동원
은 서울캠퍼스
공과대학
화학공학과
교수이자
전기화학소재 연구실
장을 겸하고 있다.
연락처: 02-2220-2337 / dongwonkim@hanyang.ac.kr
홈페이지:
http://www.echemmat.com/frontpage.asp?catalogid=emlab2&language=ko
주소:
신소재공학관
310호
학력
1984 ~ 1986 Gyeonggi Science High School
1986 ~ 1990 KAIST, B.S. in Chemical Engineering
1990 ~ 1992 KAIST, M.S. in Chemical Engineering
1992 ~ 1996 KAIST, Ph.D. in Chemical Engineering
경력
1996 - 2000	Senior Researcher, Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology
2000 - 2004	Assistant Professor, Hanbat National University
2004 - 2008	Associate Professor, Hanbat National University
2006 - 2007	Visiting Professor, Monash University (Australia)
2008 - 2009	Associate Professor, Hanyang University
2014 - 2015	Visiting Professor, Georgia Institute of Technology
2009 - Present	Professor, Hanyang University
연구 성과
2025 황화물계 전고체 전지 수명 향상
